title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 21 July 2009 - XWiki

rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 11:52  
anamarias\_\_ joined #xwiki at 11:59  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:10): Hi anamarias\_\_  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:10): hi sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:11): How are you?  
cristinas joined #xwiki at 12:11  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:11): Hi cristinas  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:11): i'm good thanks :)  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:11): hi sdumitriu!  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:12): cristinas: Successful graduation?  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:12): yes .. 10  :D  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:12): Congratulations!  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:13): Did you take a short break to relax?  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:13): a couple of days  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:14): Great  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:14): i was too stressed   
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:14): There won't be much activity on the XWiki side this week, we're all brainstorming in Paris  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:15): oh ok  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:15): brainstorming about what ? :)  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:16): these week i am working on the gui for xoo  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:16): All kinds of stuff  
arkub joined #xwiki at 12:16  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:16): is this a regular periodic kind of meeting ?  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:16): UI, performance, marketing, projects...  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:16): interesting   
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:16): cool  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:17): It's the 5 year aniversary  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:17): WOW :) !  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:17): Happy B-day !  
anamarias\_\_ - (21/07/2009 12:17): :)  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:17): Thanks  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:17): Happy Birthday ! :)  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:24): sdumitriu: you told me that you made a jira component for xoo .. i dind't manage to find it .. i see just two components for opensocial and XWikiFox  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:24): Let me check  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:25): Oh, you're probably looking at the open issues list  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:25): Where only the components with open issues are listed  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:25): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XSANDBOX/component/10799  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 12:26): If you create a new issue in the Sandbox project, you'll see the XOO component  
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:27): oh , ok   
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:27): i found it   
cristinas - (21/07/2009 12:27): thanks  
rrodriguez left at 13:08 ()  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 13:11  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:12  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 13:15  
jvelociter left at 13:15 (Client Quit)  
vmassol left at 13:18 ()  
anamarias\_\_ left at 13:18 (Ping timeout: 180 seconds)  
maggolo joined #xwiki at 13:42  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 13:47): hi @ all can someone give me support with the eventCalendar?  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:48): Hi maggolo  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:48): I can help a bit  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 13:51): hi sdumitriu ok i hope i can explain it in words you understand ;-) I updated the xwiki and now i have the problem that i can create new events but every time i get an Error: Row was updated or deleted by another transaction  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 13:51): but the event is written and i can see it in the calendar  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 13:52): i tried to check the permissions with my administrative account but if i go to the access controll of these document the admin panel on the top is gone away an if i will set new permissions i get the error that i can't do that  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:53): K, that's a low level problem  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:54): Can you pastebin the full stacktrace from the server logs?  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 13:54  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:54  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:54): Hi arunreddy\_  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:54): How's work?  
arunreddy\_ - (21/07/2009 13:57): sdumitriu: Hi  
arunreddy\_ - (21/07/2009 13:57): its going on well. Trying to write few unit tests.  
arunreddy\_ - (21/07/2009 13:57): i was struck with further development.   
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 13:57): This week is a bit busy for all the XWiki devs, so we won't be able to help you much  
arunreddy\_ - (21/07/2009 13:58): Because of code refactoring.  
arunreddy\_ - (21/07/2009 13:58): ok  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 13:59): sdumitriu here is the log http://pastebin.centos.org/27500  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 14:03): maggolo: One of the objects is out of sync with the class definition  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 14:03): Can you open that page with the object editor and tell me the classnames listed there?  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 14:15):  i hope i've understand you correctly and that is what you want: Objects of type XWiki.TagClass TagClass 0  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 14:15): Yes, this is what I want  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 14:15): Go on  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 14:15): (don't list each object, just the types)  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 14:17  
jvelociter left at 14:20 (Client Quit)  
vmassol left at 14:48 ()  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 14:49  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 14:54  
jvelociter left at 14:55 ()  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 15:03  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:03): sdumitriu, ähm what do you mean with don'tlist each object, juste the types ?  
anamarias\_\_ joined #xwiki at 15:04  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 15:06): OK, there should be: XWiki.TagClass and XWiki.CalendarEvent, are there any other types of objects?  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:06): no just XWiki.TagClass  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:07): and one line under this there is a line named Tags and an empty textbox  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:07): oh sorry yes over XWiki.TagClass there is  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:08): XWiki.CalendarEvent and for each event CalendarEvent 0 and so on  
vmassol left at 15:11 ()  
alexmaru left at 15:18 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 15:18  
maggolo - (21/07/2009 15:22): sdumitriu here is a screeshot from this page i thinkk that will help you more that my descriptions http://screenshots.rd.to/sn/000981dd30692c588c38d0fd4048ec16/3kabhmtit8t6k70y.png  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 15:28): maggolo: OK, thanks

asyd - (21/07/2009 17:17): s 8  
asyd - (21/07/2009 17:17): oups  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 17:17): asyd: I'm wondering what are you doing... You always write strange letters and numbers  
asyd - (21/07/2009 17:19): yeah, well /s <number> is an alias in irssi to change the window  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 17:20): asyd: Me neither  
asyd - (21/07/2009 17:21): so each time I forget the / ..  
asyd - (21/07/2009 17:21): and since I probably use this alias ~100 times per hour :)  
sdumitriu - (21/07/2009 17:21): I even thought you're mistyping some emacs command to switch between screens :p  
asyd - (21/07/2009 17:21): huhu
